trans-unit.source: Academy Rector
trans-unit.target: 学院教务长

trans-unit.resname: UDS·1 | Academy Rector | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME is put into a graveyard from play, you may remove CARDNAME from the game. If you do, search your library for an enchantment card and put that card into play. Then shuffle your library.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME从场上置入任何坟墓场时，你可将CARDNAME移出游戏。若你如此做，则从你的牌库中搜寻一张结界牌，并将其放置进场。然后将你的牌库洗牌。

trans-unit.source: Archery Training
trans-unit.target: 箭术训练

trans-unit.resname: UDS·2 | Archery Training | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put an arrow counter on CARDNAME.\nEnchanted creature gains "oc\nT: This creature deals X damage to target attacking or blocking creature, where X is the number of arrow counters on the CARDNAME enchanting this creature."
trans-unit.target: 在你的维持开始时，你可以在CARDNAME上放置一个弓箭指示物。\n受此结界的生物获得「ocT：此生物对目标进行攻击或阻挡的生物造成X点伤害，X等同于此生物所受之CARDNAME上弓箭指示物的数量。」

trans-unit.source: Capashen Knight
trans-unit.target: 卡帕轩骑士

trans-unit.resname: UDS·3 | Capashen Knight | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: First strike\no1oo\nW CARDNAME gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 先攻

trans-unit.source: Few warriors dare to challenge a knight of Capashen. Should one do so, there is one fewer.
trans-unit.target: o1oW：卡帕轩骑士得+1/+0直到回合结束。\n极少战士敢向卡帕轩骑士挑战。要是有人敢，那便又少了一个敢挑战的人。

trans-unit.source: Capashen Standard
trans-unit.target: 卡帕轩徽章

trans-unit.resname: UDS·4 | Capashen Standard | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Enchanted creature gets +1/+1.
trans-unit.target: 受此结界的生物得+1/+1。

trans-unit.resname: UDS·4 | Capashen Standard | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: o2, Sacrifice CARDNAME: Draw a card.
trans-unit.target: o2，牺牲CARDNAME：抽一张牌

trans-unit.source: Benalia has no need for peacocks to serve as symbols of vanity. The Capashens strut more proudly than any bird.
trans-unit.target: 宾纳里亚不需要孔雀来当作虚荣的标志。卡帕轩家族昂首阔步姿态高傲，胜于任何鸟类。

trans-unit.source: Capashen Templar
trans-unit.target: 卡帕轩圣殿骑士

trans-unit.resname: UDS·5 | Capashen Templar | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: oo\nW CARDNAME gets +0/+1 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: oW：CARDNAME得+0/+1直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: Their shields are Benalia's outermost battlements.
trans-unit.target: 他们的盾是宾纳里亚最外围的城垛。

trans-unit.source: False Prophet
trans-unit.target: 虚假先知

trans-unit.resname: UDS·6 | False Prophet | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME is put into a graveyard from play, remove all creatures from the game.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME从场上置入任何坟墓场时，将所有生物移出游戏。

trans-unit.source: "You lived for Serra's love. Will you not die for it?"
trans-unit.target: 「你为撒拉之爱而活，那你愿意为撒拉之爱而死吗？」

trans-unit.source: Fend Off
trans-unit.target: 挡架

trans-unit.resname: UDS·7 | Fend Off | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Cycling o2
trans-unit.target: 循环o2

trans-unit.resname: UDS·7 | Fend Off | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Target creature deals no combat damage this turn.
trans-unit.target: 目标生物在本回合中不造成战斗伤害。

trans-unit.source: The best defense is to not get hit.
trans-unit.target: 最好的防御就是不被打中。

trans-unit.source: Field Surgeon
trans-unit.target: 战场军医

trans-unit.resname: UDS·8 | Field Surgeon | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Tap an untapped creature you control: Prevent the next 1 damage to target creature this turn.
trans-unit.target: 横置一个你操控的未横置生物：在本回合中对目标生物防止接下来的1点伤害。

trans-unit.source: Commanders order soldiers to attack. Field surgeons order them to heal. Both are obeyed without question.
trans-unit.target: 指挥官命令士兵进攻，战场军医则命令士兵救人。两者均被遵行不悖。

trans-unit.source: Flicker
trans-unit.target: 明灭不定

trans-unit.source: Remove target nontoken permanent from the game, then return it to play under its owner's control.
trans-unit.target: 将目标非衍生物的永久物移出游戏，然后将它在其拥有者的操控下返回场上。

trans-unit.source: Who is truer: you who are, or you who are to be?
trans-unit.target: 现在的你，与未来的你，何者比较真实？

trans-unit.source: Jasmine Seer
trans-unit.target: 茉莉预言师

trans-unit.resname: UDS·10 | Jasmine Seer | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: o2o\nW, oc\nT: Reveal any number of white cards in your hand. You gain 2 life for each card revealed this way.
trans-unit.target: o2oW，ocT：展示你手牌中任意数量的白色牌。每以此法展示一张牌，你便获得2点生命。

trans-unit.resname: UDS·11 | Mask of Law and Grace | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Mask of Law and Grace
trans-unit.target: 法与美之面具

trans-unit.resname: UDS·11 | Mask of Law and Grace | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Enchanted creature gains protection from black and protection from red.
trans-unit.target: 受此结界的生物获得反黑保护及反红保护。

trans-unit.resname: UDS·11 | Mask of Law and Grace | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The archangels zealously drove Serra's light into every corner of their new home as if their creator still commanded them.
trans-unit.target: 大天使们急切地将撒拉的光芒带到新家的每一个角落，如同他们的创造者仍然在带领著他们一样。

trans-unit.source: Master Healer
trans-unit.target: 疗疾神医

trans-unit.resname: UDS·12 | Master Healer | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: oc\nT: Prevent the next 4 damage to target creature or player this turn.
trans-unit.target: ocT：对目标生物或玩家防止本回合接下来的4点伤害。

trans-unit.source: Behind his eyes is the pain of every soldier his hands have healed.
trans-unit.target: 他眼中深埋了每个曾亲手受他医治之士兵的苦痛。

trans-unit.source: Opalescence
trans-unit.target: 蛋白石光辉

trans-unit.source: Each other global enchantment is a creature with power and toughness each equal to its converted mana cost. It's still an enchantment.
trans-unit.target: 所有其它的广域结界，都是力量与防御力等同于其总魔法力费用的生物。它们仍是结界。

trans-unit.source: Reliquary Monk
trans-unit.target: 圣物守护僧

trans-unit.resname: UDS·14 | Reliquary Monk | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME is put into a graveyard from play, destroy target artifact or enchantment.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME从场上置入任何坟墓场时，消灭目标神器或结界。

trans-unit.source: A thing of Serra's realm exists only by the grace of her followers' faith.
trans-unit.target: 就是撒拉信徒的坚贞信念，才使得撒拉圣域如此地美好。

trans-unit.source: Replenish
trans-unit.target: 充盈

trans-unit.source: Return all enchantment cards from your graveyard to play. (Local enchantments with no permanent to enchant remain in your graveyard.)
trans-unit.target: 将你坟墓场中所有的结界牌返回场上。（若无可受此区域结界之永久物，则该区域结界仍留在你的坟墓场中）

trans-unit.source: Treasures, trinkets, trash—the relics of the past are brought forth again.
trans-unit.target: 宝藏、饰物、垃圾～古时遗物又再度重现。

trans-unit.source: Sanctimony
trans-unit.target: 故作虔诚

trans-unit.source: Whenever one of your opponents taps a mountain for mana, you may gain 1 life.
trans-unit.target: 每当任一对手横置一张山脉以获得魔法力时，你可获得1点生命。

trans-unit.source: "To forgive our enemies is to forgive ourselves."
trans-unit.target: 「原谅敌人，就是原谅我们自己。」

trans-unit.resname: UDS·17 | Scent of Jasmine | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Scent of Jasmine
trans-unit.target: 茉莉气息

trans-unit.resname: UDS·17 | Scent of Jasmine | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Reveal any number of white cards in your hand. You gain 2 life for each card revealed this way.
trans-unit.target: 展示你手牌中任意数量的白色牌。每以此法展示一张牌，你便获得2点生命。

trans-unit.source: Scour
trans-unit.target: 除垢

trans-unit.source: Remove target enchantment from the game. Search its controller's graveyard, hand, and library for all copies of that card and remove them from the game. That player then shuffles his or her library.
trans-unit.target: 将目标结界移出游戏。由该玩家的坟墓场、手牌、以及牌库中搜寻该名称的牌，并将这些牌移出游戏。在此后，该玩家将他的牌库洗牌。

trans-unit.target: 飞行\nocT：目标进行攻击或阻挡的生物得+2/+2直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: An angel's touch can prepare a soldier for battle more than a thousand military drills.
trans-unit.target: 天使的抚触可让士兵迎向战斗，胜过军事训练千倍。

trans-unit.source: Solidarity
trans-unit.target: 团结一致

trans-unit.source: Creatures you control get +0/+5 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 你操控的所有生物得+0/+5直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: Their commitment to Serra is as solid as any shield.
trans-unit.target: 他们对撒拉的承诺始终不移，比之坚盾毫不逊色。

trans-unit.source: When you control no enchantments, sacrifice CARDNAME.

trans-unit.source: Flying

trans-unit.source: Falling from heaven is not as painful as surviving the impact.
trans-unit.target: 坠入凡间所受的苦痛，远比不上在这场冲击下幸存。

trans-unit.resname: UDS·23 | Voice of Duty | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Next to Law is Duty, and Duty must be obeyed. If the frame of Duty is broken, none shall weave life's fabric."\n—*Song of All*, canto 167
trans-unit.target: 「律法之次为道义，而道义必须确实遵守。若道义之框破灭，将无人可编织生命的脉络。」\n～万物之歌，167节

trans-unit.resname: UDS·24 | Voice of Reason | Card Name

trans-unit.target: 理性使者

trans-unit.target: 「美善之次为理性，而理性必须把持住。若理性之网散落，疯狂便将四窜。」\n～万物之歌，167节

trans-unit.resname: UDS·25 | Wall of Glare | Card Name

trans-unit.resname: UDS·25 | Wall of Glare | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The blinding barrier served Benalia better than a hundred shields.
trans-unit.target: 这道眩目障碍对宾纳里亚的贡献，比上百张盾还巨大。

trans-unit.source: Flying\no3oo\nU Untap CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 飞行\no3oU：重置CARDNAME。

trans-unit.source: Students who had seen Rayne argue with Urza were certain she had summoned it to make him seem warmer by comparison.
trans-unit.target: 看到蕾安与克撒争论的学生，都确定她召唤了暴风雪元素，让克撒相比之下能显得温暖一点。

trans-unit.source: "Chancellor Rayne canceled the annual beeble roast. I should have married a crueler woman."\n—Barrin
trans-unit.target: 「蕾安院长取消了每年一度的烤哔宝精活动。我想我应该娶一个残忍一点的老婆。」\n～巴林

trans-unit.target: 如果一开始你没有成功，那赶快跑开躲起来。

trans-unit.source: "Mind if I just lie down right here for a few weeks?"

trans-unit.source: CARDNAME gains flying as long as it's enchanted.
trans-unit.target: 若CARDNAME受有任何结界，则它获得飞行异能。

trans-unit.source: It isn't truly born until its first flight.

trans-unit.source: o2, Sacrifice CARDNAME: Draw a card.
trans-unit.target: o2，牺牲CARDNAME：抽一张牌。

trans-unit.source: For a moment, Urza thought not of war and destruction, but of the freedom of the skies.
trans-unit.target: 这一刻克撒想到的不是战争与毁灭，而是天空的自由。

trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME comes into play, return target enchant creature card from a graveyard to play enchanting CARDNAME. (You control that enchantment.)

trans-unit.target: 飞行

trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME is put into a graveyard from play, draw a card.

trans-unit.source: o1o\nU, Choose and discard a card from your hand: Draw a card.
trans-unit.target: o1oU，从你手中选择并弃掉一张牌：抽一张牌。

trans-unit.source: Barrin drowned his doubts about Urza's project by delving ever deeper into its details.
trans-unit.target: 巴林以深究细节，来表达他对克撒计划的怀疑。

trans-unit.source: Metathran Elite
trans-unit.target: 仿索蓝精兵

trans-unit.resname: UDS·38 | Metathran Elite | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME is unblockable as long as it's enchanted.
trans-unit.target: 若CARDNAME受有任何结界，则它不可被阻挡。

trans-unit.source: If the eyes are windows to the soul, their souls are not of this world.
trans-unit.target: 如果眼睛是灵魂之窗，那他们的灵魂必不属于这个世界。

trans-unit.source: CARDNAME is unblockable.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME不可被阻挡。

trans-unit.source: Just as Serra crafted angels of light and faith, Urza constructed an army of sorcery and power to resist the coming invasion.
trans-unit.target: 如同撒拉用光明与信念创造了天使，克撒也用巫术与力量建立了一支军队，以抵御外侮。

trans-unit.target: 唱反调

trans-unit.target: 横置一个你所操控且未横置的生物：横置目标神器、生物，或地。

trans-unit.source: "Urza says he's sane. Perhaps, but measures of sanity among planeswalkers are hard to come by."\n—Barrin
trans-unit.target: 「克撒说他神智清楚。也许吧，不过判断旅法师神智是否清楚的标准，却是难寻至极。」\n～巴林

trans-unit.source: Private Research

trans-unit.target: 作废

trans-unit.source: Counter target instant or sorcery spell. Search its controller's graveyard, hand, and library for all copies of that card and remove them from the game. That player then shuffles his or her library.
trans-unit.target: 反击目标瞬间或巫术咒语。由该玩家的坟墓场、手牌、以及牌库中搜寻该名称的牌，并将这些牌移出游戏。在此后，该玩家将他的牌库洗牌。

trans-unit.resname: UDS·43 | Rayne, Academy Chancellor | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Rayne, Academy Chancellor
trans-unit.target: 大学院长蕾安

trans-unit.resname: UDS·43 | Rayne, Academy Chancellor | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever you or a permanent you control is the target of a spell or ability controlled by one of your opponents, you may draw a card, and if CARDNAME is enchanted, you may draw another card.
trans-unit.target: 每当你或你所操控的永久物，成为你的任一对手所操控之咒语或异能的目标时，你可抽一张牌；而若CARDNAME受有结界时，你可再多抽一张牌。

trans-unit.source: Rescue
trans-unit.target: 拯救

trans-unit.source: Return target permanent you control to its owner's hand.
trans-unit.target: 将你所操控的目标永久物移回其拥有者手上。

trans-unit.source: "Urza, I've discovered more promising students than you and my husband have, combined. And I haven't lost a single one."\n—Rayne, Academy Chancellor
trans-unit.target: 「克撒，我找到的好学生比你和我丈夫所找到的加在一起还要多。而且我还未失去过任何一个。」\n～大学院长蕾安

trans-unit.resname: UDS·45 | Scent of Brine | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Scent of Brine
trans-unit.target: 盐湖气息

trans-unit.resname: UDS·45 | Scent of Brine | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Reveal any number of blue cards in your hand. Counter target spell unless its controller pays o1 for each card revealed this way.
trans-unit.target: 展示你手牌中任意数量的蓝色牌。除非目标咒语的操控者为每一张以此法展示的蓝色牌支付o1，否则反击该咒语。

trans-unit.resname: UDS·46 | Sigil of Sleep | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Sigil of Sleep
trans-unit.target: 催眠印

trans-unit.resname: UDS·46 | Sigil of Sleep | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever enchanted creature deals damage to a player, return target creature that player controls to its owner's hand.
trans-unit.target: 每当受此结界的生物对任一玩家造成伤害时，将该玩家所操控的目标生物移回其拥有者手上。

trans-unit.resname: UDS·46 | Sigil of Sleep | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Arrows are only one way to remove an enemy.
trans-unit.target: 弓箭只不过是杀敌方法的一种而已。

trans-unit.source: Telepathic Spies
trans-unit.target: 传心间谍

trans-unit.resname: UDS·47 | Telepathic Spies | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME comes into play, look at target opponent's hand.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进场时，检视目标对手的手牌。

trans-unit.source: "Do try to keep an open mind, would you?"
trans-unit.target: 「你一直试著保持开放的心胸，没错吧？」

trans-unit.source: Temporal Adept
trans-unit.target: 时间专家

trans-unit.resname: UDS·48 | Temporal Adept | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source:
o
Uo
Uo
U, oc
T: Return target permanent to its owner's hand.
trans-unit.target: oUoUoU，ocT：将目标永久物移回其拥有者手上。

trans-unit.source: "Of course she's at the head of her class. All her classmates have disappeared."\n—Gatha, Tolarian renegade
trans-unit.target: 「当然她是我们班的第一名，因为她的同学全都失踪了。」\n～陶拉里亚叛徒迦沙

trans-unit.source: Thieving Magpie
trans-unit.target: 窃鹊

trans-unit.resname: UDS·49 | Thieving Magpie | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Flying
trans-unit.target: 飞行

trans-unit.resname: UDS·49 | Thieving Magpie | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME deals damage to one of your opponents, you draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME对任一对手造成伤害时，你抽一张牌。

trans-unit.source: Rayne once made several unkind comparisons between the bird's naked opportunism and Urza's.
trans-unit.target: 蕾安有一次拿这种鸟的贪机抓时，来和克撒做了几个刻薄的比较。

trans-unit.source: Treachery
trans-unit.target: 背信忘义

trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME comes into play, untap up to five lands.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进场时，重置最多五张地。

trans-unit.source: You control enchanted creature.
trans-unit.target: 你操控受此结界的生物。

trans-unit.source: "The academy educates; I employ. It's a perfect arrangement."\n—Gatha, Tolarian renegade
trans-unit.target: 「学院教育人才，我雇用人才。这是完美的安排。」\n～陶拉里亚叛徒迦沙

trans-unit.source: Apprentice Necromancer
trans-unit.target: 死灵术士学徒

trans-unit.resname: UDS·51 | Apprentice Necromancer | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source:
o
B, oc
T, Sacrifice CARDNAME: Return target creature card from your graveyard to play. That creature gains haste. At end of turn, sacrifice it. (The creature may attack and oc
T the turn it comes under your control.)
trans-unit.target: oB，ocT，牺牲CARDNAME：将目标生物牌从你的坟墓场中移回场上。该生物获得敏捷异能。在回合结束时，牺牲该生物。#（你操控此生物的该回合中，它便可以攻击以及ocT）

trans-unit.source: Attrition
trans-unit.target: 消耗战

trans-unit.source: o\nB, Sacrifice a creature: Destroy target nonblack creature.
trans-unit.target: oB，牺牲一个生物：消灭目标非黑色生物。

trans-unit.source: "I will trade life for life with the insurgents. Our resources, unlike theirs, are limitless."\n—Davvol, Evincar of Rath
trans-unit.target: 「我宁愿和异党们硬碰硬。和他们不同，我们的资源是无限的。」\n～瑞斯大魔将达渥尔

trans-unit.source: Body Snatcher
trans-unit.target: 窃体者

trans-unit.resname: UDS·53 | Body Snatcher | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME comes into play, you may choose and discard a creature card from your hand. If you don't, remove CARDNAME from the game.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进场时，你可以从手牌中选择并弃掉一张牌。若你不如此作，则将CARDNAME移出游戏。

trans-unit.resname: UDS·53 | Body Snatcher | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME is put into a graveyard from play, remove CARDNAME from the game and return target creature card from your graveyard to play.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME从场上置入任何坟墓场时，将CARDNAME移出游戏，并将目标生物牌从你的坟墓场中移回场上。

trans-unit.source: Bubbling Muck
trans-unit.target: 发泡堆肥

trans-unit.resname: UDS·54 | Bubbling Muck | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Until end of turn, whenever a player taps a swamp for mana, it produces an additional o\nB.
trans-unit.target: 直到回合结束，每当任何玩家横置沼泽以产生魔法力时，该地产生额外的oB。

trans-unit.source: The muck claims a hundred living things for each meager treasure it spews forth.
trans-unit.target: 经过无数生命的滋养，才能让堆肥吐出一丁点宝藏。

trans-unit.resname: UDS·55 | Carnival of Souls | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Carnival of Souls
trans-unit.target: 群魂狂欢

trans-unit.resname: UDS·55 | Carnival of Souls | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Whenever a creature comes into play, you lose 1 life and add o\nB to your mana pool.
trans-unit.target: 每当任何生物进场时，你便失去1点生命，并且加oB至你的魔法力池中。

trans-unit.resname: UDS·55 | Carnival of Souls | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "'Davvol, blast those elves.' 'Davvol, transport those troops.' No one cares that today is my birthday."
trans-unit.target: 「『达渥尔，作掉那些妖精』、『达渥尔，运送那些部队』，就是没人记得今天是我生日。」

trans-unit.resname: UDS·56 | Chime of Night | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Chime of Night
trans-unit.target: 夜之鸣钟

trans-unit.resname: UDS·56 | Chime of Night | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME is put into a graveyard from play, destroy target nonblack creature.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME从场上置入任何坟墓场时，消灭目标非黑色生物。

trans-unit.resname: UDS·56 | Chime of Night | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Many sent to serve Davvol carried such instruments, as if to remind him who their true masters were.
trans-unit.target: 许多被送去服侍达渥尔的侍从都带著这个乐器，这似乎是为了提醒他们谁才是真正的主人。

trans-unit.source: Disease Carriers
trans-unit.target: 疾病带原体

trans-unit.resname: UDS·57 | Disease Carriers | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME is put into a graveyard from play, target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME从场上置入任何坟墓场时，目标生物得-2/-2直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: Rath is a disease all its inhabitants carry.
trans-unit.target: 瑞斯是种疾病，而其中的居民都是患者。

trans-unit.source: Dying Wail
trans-unit.target: 垂死悲泣

trans-unit.resname: UDS·58 | Dying Wail | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When enchanted creature is put into a graveyard from play, target player chooses and discards two cards from his or her hand.
trans-unit.target: 当受此结界的生物从场上置入任何坟墓场时，目标玩家从手牌中选择并弃掉两张牌。

trans-unit.source: This is a world of spiteful wasps that sting and kill even as they die.
trans-unit.target: 这是一个充满恶毒蚊虫的世界，它们临死也要叮咬杀戮。

trans-unit.source: Encroach
trans-unit.target: 侵蚀

trans-unit.source: Look at target player's hand and choose a nonbasic land card from it. That player discards that card.
trans-unit.target: 检视目标玩家的手牌，并从其中选择一张非基本地牌。该玩家弃掉该牌。

trans-unit.source: "The rate of spread in this region is unacceptable. Start again."\n—Davvol, Evincar of Rath
trans-unit.target: 「占领这块区域的速度太慢了，重来一次。」\n～瑞司大魔将达渥尔

trans-unit.source: Eradicate
trans-unit.target: 诛灭

trans-unit.source: Remove target nonblack creature from the game. Search its controller's graveyard, hand, and library for all copies of that card and remove them from the game. That player then shuffles his or her library.
trans-unit.target: 将目标非黑色生物移出游戏。由该玩家的坟墓场、手牌、以及牌库中搜寻该名称的牌，并将这些牌移出游戏。在此后，该玩家将他的牌库洗牌。

trans-unit.source: Festering Wound
trans-unit.target: 溃脓创伤

trans-unit.resname: UDS·61 | Festering Wound | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put an infection counter on CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 在你的维持开始时，你可以在CARDNAME上面放置一个感染指示物。

trans-unit.resname: UDS·61 | Festering Wound | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted creature's controller, CARDNAME deals X damage to that player, where X is the number of infection counters on CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 在受此结界生物之控制者的维持开始时，CARDNAME对该玩家造成X点伤害，X等同于CARDNAME上面感染指示物的数量。

trans-unit.source: Lurking Jackals
trans-unit.target: 伏击豺狼

trans-unit.resname: UDS·62 | Lurking Jackals | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When one of your opponents has 10 life or less, if CARDNAME is an enchantment, it becomes a 3/2 Hound creature.
trans-unit.target: 当你的任一对手之生命剩下10点或以下时，若此时CARDNAME为一结界，则它成为3/2，并视为猎犬的生物。

trans-unit.source: Often it's not the hunter or the hunted but the opportunist who thrives in Rath.
trans-unit.target: 有时它们不是猎人也非被猎者，而是活跃于瑞斯的投机份子。

trans-unit.source: Nightshade Seer
trans-unit.target: 龙葵预言师

trans-unit.resname: UDS·63 | Nightshade Seer | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: o2o\nB, oc\nT: Reveal any number of black cards in your hand. Target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn, where X is the number of cards revealed this way.
trans-unit.target: o2oB，ocT：展示你手牌中任意数量的黑色牌。目标生物得-X/-X直到回合结束，X等同于你以此法所展示的牌数量。

trans-unit.source: Phyrexian Monitor
trans-unit.target: 非瑞克西亚监察员

trans-unit.resname: UDS·64 | Phyrexian Monitor | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: oo\nB Regenerate CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: oB：重生CARDNAME。

trans-unit.source: Being one would be an honor, if the word "honor" had any meaning in Phyrexia.
trans-unit.target: 如果「荣誉」这个字眼在非瑞克西亚还有任何意义的话，那么成为其中的一员还真是无上光荣。

trans-unit.source: Phyrexian Negator
trans-unit.target: 非瑞克西亚绝灭兽

trans-unit.resname: UDS·65 | Phyrexian Negator | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Trample
trans-unit.target: 践踏

trans-unit.resname: UDS·65 | Phyrexian Negator | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME is dealt damage, sacrifice a permanent for each 1 damage dealt to it.
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME受到1点伤害时，你便牺牲一个永久物。

trans-unit.source: They exist to cease.
trans-unit.target: 它们为了绝灭而存在。

trans-unit.source: Plague Dogs
trans-unit.target: 疫病犬

trans-unit.resname: UDS·66 | Plague Dogs | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME is put into a graveyard from play, all creatures get -1/-1 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME从场上置入任何坟墓场时，所有生物得-1/-1直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: UDS·66 | Plague Dogs | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: o2, Sacrifice CARDNAME: Draw a card.
trans-unit.target: o2，牺牲CARDNAME：抽一张牌。

trans-unit.source: They're not just retrievers, they're carriers.
trans-unit.target: 他们不仅取回，还是带原者。

trans-unit.source: Rapid Decay
trans-unit.target: 迅速腐烂

trans-unit.resname: UDS·67 | Rapid Decay | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Cycling o2
trans-unit.target: 循环o2

trans-unit.resname: UDS·67 | Rapid Decay | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Remove from the game up to three target cards in a single graveyard.
trans-unit.target: 从一个坟墓场中将至多三张目标牌移出游戏。

trans-unit.source: The grave robbers arrived the day after the burial. They were a day too late.
trans-unit.target: 盗墓者们在丧礼的翌日开始了行动，却发现已晚了一天。

trans-unit.source: Ravenous Rats
trans-unit.target: 贪吃老鼠

trans-unit.resname: UDS·68 | Ravenous Rats | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME comes into play, target opponent chooses and discards a card from his or her hand.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进场时，目标对手从手牌中选择并弃掉一张牌。

trans-unit.source: "For all the priceless tomes they have destroyed, one would think they would taste better."\n—Davvol, Evincar of Rath
trans-unit.target: 「它们摧毁了那么多无价的典籍，我以为它们尝起来会好吃些。」\n～瑞斯大魔将达渥尔

trans-unit.resname: UDS·69 | Scent of Nightshade | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Scent of Nightshade
trans-unit.target: 龙葵气息

trans-unit.resname: UDS·69 | Scent of Nightshade | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Reveal any number of black cards in your hand. Target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn, where X is the number of cards revealed this way.
trans-unit.target: 展示你手牌中任意数量的黑色牌。目标生物得-X/-X直到回合结束，X等同于你以此法所展示的牌数量。

trans-unit.source: Skittering Horror
trans-unit.target: 掠行惊惧兽

trans-unit.resname: UDS·70 | Skittering Horror | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When you play a creature spell, sacrifice CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 当你使用任何生物咒语时，牺牲CARDNAME。

trans-unit.source: "This monstrosity will do—for now."\n—Davvol, Evincar of Rath
trans-unit.target: 「暂时大概这么怪就好了。」\n～瑞斯大魔将达渥尔

trans-unit.source: Slinking Skirge
trans-unit.target: 鬼祟斯克魔

trans-unit.resname: UDS·71 | Slinking Skirge | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Flying
trans-unit.target: 飞行

trans-unit.resname: UDS·71 | Slinking Skirge | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: o2, Sacrifice CARDNAME: Draw a card.
trans-unit.target: o2，牺牲CARDNAME：抽一张牌。

trans-unit.source: Davvol encouraged the skirges; they made excellent sentries and were quite edible if properly seasoned.
trans-unit.target: 达渥尔很喜欢斯克魔：它们不但是优秀的尖兵，而且如果适当地调味，还十分爽口。

trans-unit.source: Soul Feast
trans-unit.target: 灵魂盛宴

trans-unit.resname: UDS·72 | Soul Feast | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Target player loses 4 life and you gain 4 life.
trans-unit.target: 目标对手失去4点生命，并且你获得4点生命。

trans-unit.source: As no one has ever accepted a second invitation to Davvol's table, the evincar often dines alone.
trans-unit.target: 从未有人再次接受达渥尔的聚餐邀请，所以大魔将总是独自用餐。

trans-unit.source: Squirming Mass
trans-unit.target: 蠕动团块

trans-unit.resname: UDS·73 | Squirming Mass | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and black creatures.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME只能被神器生物或黑色生物阻挡。

trans-unit.source: Only the coldest hearts and the strongest stomachs can stand against it.
trans-unit.target: 只有最冷酷的心和最健壮的胃才能面对它。

trans-unit.source: Twisted Experiment
trans-unit.target: 变态实验

trans-unit.resname: UDS·74 | Twisted Experiment | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Enchanted creature gets +3/-1.
trans-unit.target: 受此结界的生物得+3/-1。

trans-unit.source: Gatha showed remarkable prowess in increasing his subjects' stature. Their lifespans, however, were another matter.
trans-unit.target: 迦沙对于增强实验对象的体格具有极大的信心，然其是否能活得长久则是另一回事。

trans-unit.source: Yawgmoth's Bargain
trans-unit.target: 约格莫夫式交易

trans-unit.resname: UDS·75 | Yawgmoth's Bargain | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Skip your draw step.
trans-unit.target: 略过你的抽牌步骤。

trans-unit.resname: UDS·75 | Yawgmoth's Bargain | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Pay 1 life: Draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 支付1点生命：抽一张牌。

trans-unit.source: He craves only one commodity.
trans-unit.target: 祂只需要一样东西。

trans-unit.source: Aether Sting
trans-unit.target: 乙太刺触

trans-unit.resname: UDS·76 | Aether Sting | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever one of your opponents plays a creature spell, Æther Sting deals 1 damage to that player.
trans-unit.target: 每当任一对手使用生物咒语时，CARDNAME对该玩家造成1点伤害。

trans-unit.source: When Gatha fell, he was called to account for each abomination he created.
trans-unit.target: 当迦沙失势时，他被派去清算所有自己造出的憎恨兽。

trans-unit.source: Bloodshot Cyclops
trans-unit.target: 血丝独眼巨人

trans-unit.resname: UDS·77 | Bloodshot Cyclops | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: oc\nT, Sacrifice a creature: CARDNAME deals X damage to target creature or player, where X is the sacrificed creature's power.
trans-unit.target: ocT，牺牲一个生物：CARDNAME对目标生物或玩家造成X点伤害，X等同于被牺牲之生物的力量。

trans-unit.source: After their first encounter, the goblins named him Chuck.
trans-unit.target: 他们首次遭遇之后，鬼怪便称他为投手查克。

trans-unit.source: Cinder Seer
trans-unit.target: 煤渣预言师

trans-unit.resname: UDS·78 | Cinder Seer | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: o2o\nR, oc\nT: Reveal any number of red cards in your hand. CARDNAME deals X damage to target creature or player, where X is the number of cards revealed this way.
trans-unit.target: o2oR，ocT：展示你手牌中任意数量的红色牌。CARDNAME对目标生物或玩家造成X点伤害，X等同于你以此法所展示的牌数量。

trans-unit.source: Colos Yearling
trans-unit.target: 幼寇骡

trans-unit.resname: UDS·79 | Colos Yearling | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Mountainwalk (This creature is unblockable as long as defending player controls a mountain.)\noo\nR CARDNAME gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 山脉行者#（若防御玩家操控任何山脉，则此生物无法被阻挡）#\noR：CARDNAME得+1/+0直到回合结束

trans-unit.source: A steed grows with its rider.
trans-unit.target: 坐骑随著骑乘者成长。

trans-unit.source: Covetous Dragon
trans-unit.target: 贪婪巨龙

trans-unit.resname: UDS·80 | Covetous Dragon | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Flying
trans-unit.target: 飞行

trans-unit.resname: UDS·80 | Covetous Dragon | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: When you control no artifacts, sacrifice CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 当你未操控任何神器时，牺牲CARDNAME。

trans-unit.source: Gatha survived as long as he did by giving all Keld's predators exactly what they wanted.
trans-unit.target: 迦沙给了凯尔顿猎食者们想要的东西，所以才能苟活。

trans-unit.source: Flame Jet
trans-unit.target: 喷焰

trans-unit.target: 循环o2

trans-unit.source: CARDNAME deals 3 damage to target player.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME对目标玩家造成3点伤害。

trans-unit.source: Did the land make the Keldons? Did the Keldons make the land? Or were they simply meant for each other?
trans-unit.target: 是这大地造就了凯尔顿人？还是凯尔顿人造就了这大地？亦或他们是相互造就的？

trans-unit.source: Goblin Berserker
trans-unit.target: 鬼怪狂战士

trans-unit.resname: UDS·82 | Goblin Berserker | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: First strike; haste (This creature may attack and oc\nT the turn it comes under your control.)
trans-unit.target: 先攻；敏捷#（你操控此生物的该回合中，它便可以攻击以及ocT）#

trans-unit.source: Goblins don't know the meaning of the word "tactics"\n—or the word "meaning," for that matter.
trans-unit.target: 鬼怪不知道「战术」这个词的意义，其实他们连「意义」这个词都搞不清楚。

trans-unit.source: Goblin Festival
trans-unit.target: 鬼怪节庆

trans-unit.resname: UDS·83 | Goblin Festival | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: o2: CARDNAME deals 1 damage to target creature or player. Flip a coin. If you lose the flip, choose one of your opponents. That player gains control of CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: o2：CARDNAME对目标生物或玩家造成1点伤害。掷一次硬币。如果你输掉此掷，则选择一个对手。该玩家获得CARDNAME的操控权。

trans-unit.source: "What are we celebratin' again?"
trans-unit.target: 「我们又在庆祝些什么？」

trans-unit.source: Goblin Gardener
trans-unit.target: 鬼怪园丁

trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME is put into a graveyard from play, destroy target land.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME从场上置入任何坟墓场时，消灭目标地。

trans-unit.source: "Grow food in dirt? Save time—eat dirt."
trans-unit.target: 「在土里种植食物？省省时间，直接吃土吧。」

trans-unit.source: Goblin Marshal
trans-unit.target: 鬼怪元帅

trans-unit.target: 返响

trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进场或从场上置入任何坟墓场时，放置两个1/1，红色的鬼怪衍生物进场。

trans-unit.source: Goblin Masons
trans-unit.target: 鬼怪泥水匠

trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME is put into a graveyard from play, destroy target Wall.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME从场上置入任何坟墓场时，消灭目标墙。

trans-unit.source: "Goblins build with true zeal—and anything else within arm's reach."
trans-unit.target: 鬼怪在建造房舍时非常热心～他们会用上手边的任何东西。

trans-unit.source: Hulking Ogre
trans-unit.target: 笨拙食人魔

trans-unit.resname: UDS·87 | Hulking Ogre | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME can't block.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME不能进行阻挡。

trans-unit.source: "The Keldons' ogre campaign provided more body parts than my meager facility could properly use."\n—Gatha, Tolarian renegade
trans-unit.target: 「凯尔顿食人魔之役所提供的肢体，多到令我这贫乏的设备难以利用。」\n～陶拉里亚叛徒迦沙

trans-unit.source: Impatience

trans-unit.target: 在每个玩家回合结束时，若该玩家在该回合未使用咒语，则CARDNAME对该玩家造成2点伤害。

trans-unit.source: Ask a Keldon to hold his temper and you'll be left holding your guts.
trans-unit.target: 要求凯尔顿人忍住脾气，你就要准备忍住伤痛。

trans-unit.source: Incendiary
trans-unit.target: 纵火

trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put a fuse counter on CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 在你的维持开始时，你可以在CARDNAME上面放置一个导线指示物。

trans-unit.source: When enchanted creature is put into a graveyard, CARDNAME deals X damage to target creature or player, where X is the number of fuse counters on CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 当受此结界之生物被置入任何坟墓场时，CARDNAME对目标玩家造成X点伤害， X等同于CARDNAME上面导线指示物的数量。

trans-unit.source: Keldon Champion

trans-unit.source: Echo; haste (This creature may attack and oc\nT the turn it comes under your control.)\nWhen CARDNAME comes into play, it deals 3 damage to target player.
trans-unit.target: 返响；敏捷#（你操控此生物的该回合中，它便可以攻击以及ocT）#\n当CARDNAME进场时，它对目标玩家造成3点伤害。

trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME comes into play, destroy target artifact.

trans-unit.target: 凯尔顿人将他们掠夺来的东西分成两种：战利品以及投石器的弹药。

trans-unit.target: 落磐

trans-unit.target: 牺牲任意数量的山脉。CARDNAME对目标玩家造成等同此数量的伤害。

trans-unit.source: Sometimes the mountain takes.\n—Keldon saying
trans-unit.target: 有时山也会拿走些东西。\n～凯尔顿谚语

trans-unit.resname: UDS·93 | Mark of Fury | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Mark of Fury
trans-unit.target: 狂怒的印记

trans-unit.resname: UDS·93 | Mark of Fury | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Enchanted creature gains haste. (It may attack and oc\nT the turn it comes under your control.)\nAt end of turn, return CARDNAME to its owner's hand.
trans-unit.target: 受此结界的生物获得敏捷异能。#（你操控此生物的该回合中，它便可以攻击以及ocT）#\n在回合结束时，将CARDNAME移回其拥有者手上。

trans-unit.resname: UDS·93 | Mark of Fury | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Many Keldon warriors bear the mark of intentional insanity.
trans-unit.target: 许多凯尔顿战士在身上刻画了疯狂的印记。

trans-unit.source: Reckless Abandon
trans-unit.target: 悍然舍弃

trans-unit.source: As an additional cost to play CARDNAME, sacrifice a creature.
trans-unit.target: 牺牲一个生物，以作为CARDNAME的额外费用。

trans-unit.source: CARDNAME deals 4 damage to target creature or player.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME对目标生物或玩家造成4点伤害。

trans-unit.source: The climax of a warlord's career is always death.
trans-unit.target: 战将生涯的最高峰就是死亡。

trans-unit.source: Repercussion
trans-unit.target: 后遗症

trans-unit.source: Whenever a creature is dealt damage, CARDNAME deals that much damage to that creature's controller.
trans-unit.target: 每当任何生物受到伤害时，CARDNAME对该生物的操控者造成等量的伤害。

trans-unit.source: Not all Keld's warriors are found on the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: 凯尔顿战士并非全都在战场上。

trans-unit.resname: UDS·96 | Scent of Cinder | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Reveal any number of red cards in your hand. CARDNAME deals X damage to target creature or player, where X is the number of cards revealed this way.
trans-unit.target: 展示你手牌中任意数量的红色牌。CARDNAME对目标生物或玩家造成X点伤害，X等同于你以此法所展示的牌数量。

trans-unit.source: Sowing Salt
trans-unit.target: 覆盐

trans-unit.resname: UDS·97 | Sowing Salt | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Remove target nonbasic land from the game. Search its controller's graveyard, hand, and library for all copies of that card and remove them from the game. That player then shuffles his or her library.
trans-unit.target: 将目标非基本地移出游戏。自该玩家的坟墓场、手牌、以及牌库中搜寻该名称的牌，并将这些牌移出游戏。在此后，该玩家将他的牌库洗牌。

trans-unit.source: Trumpet Blast
trans-unit.target: 号角震天

trans-unit.resname: UDS·98 | Trumpet Blast | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Attacking creatures get +2/+0 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 进行攻击的生物得+2/+0直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: Keldon warriors don't need signals to tell them when to attack, but when to stop.
trans-unit.target: 凯尔顿战士不需要施令进攻，但却需要停手的讯号。

trans-unit.resname: UDS·99 | Wake of Destruction | Card Name

trans-unit.target: 坏灭的足迹

trans-unit.source: Destroy target land and all lands with the same name as that land.
trans-unit.target: 消灭目标地以及所有与该地名称相同的地。

trans-unit.resname: UDS·99 | Wake of Destruction | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Land charred black, rivers boiled, Crops and wells alike despoiled, Mountains leveled, forests felled— Footprints of the beasts of Keld.
trans-unit.target:
土地焦黑，河流沸腾，
农作与谷物，全数遭抢夺，
山脉陷落，树林塌崩，
凯尔顿野兽，足迹遍四周。

trans-unit.target: 野寇骡

trans-unit.source: Haste (This creature may attack and oc\nT the turn it comes under your control.)
trans-unit.target: 敏捷#（你操控此生物的该回合中，它便可以攻击以及ocT）#

trans-unit.source: You'll never get a Keldon's goat.
trans-unit.target: 「你绝对抓不到凯尔顿山羊。」

trans-unit.target: 老银背

trans-unit.source: oo\nG Regenerate CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: oG：重生CARDNAME。

trans-unit.source: The Phyrexian killing machines couldn't have known the seriousness of their mistake in wounding the ape—they'd never seen it angry.
trans-unit.target: 非瑞克西亚的杀戮机器们，根本不知道伤害猿猴这项错误的严重性～它们从未见过猿猴发威。

trans-unit.source: Compost
trans-unit.target: 堆肥

trans-unit.source: Whenever a black card is put into one of your opponents' graveyards, you may draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 每当一张黑色牌置入任一对手的坟墓场时，你可以抽一张牌。

trans-unit.source: A fruit must rot before its seed can sprout.\n—Yavimaya saying
trans-unit.target: 「要果肉先腐烂，种子才能发芽。」\n～亚维马雅谚语

trans-unit.source: CARDNAME can't be the target of spells or abilities.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME不能成为咒语或异能的目标。

trans-unit.source: Like a masterful quilter, Yavimaya stitches together patches of color to warn its denizens of threats.
trans-unit.target: 如熟练的织者一般，亚维马雅将颜色的碎块缝合补缀，提醒居民各种威胁。

trans-unit.source: Elvish Piper
trans-unit.target: 妖精吹笛手

trans-unit.resname: UDS·104 | Elvish Piper | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: o\nG, oc\nT: Put a creature card from your hand into play.
trans-unit.target: oG，ocT：将一张生物牌从你的手牌中放置进场。

trans-unit.source: From Gaea grew the world, and the world was silent. From Gaea grew the world's elves, and the world was silent no more.\n—Elvish teaching
trans-unit.target: 盖亚肇生世界，而后世界一片沉寂。盖亚肇生世界中之妖精，而后世界不再沉寂。\n～妖精教诲

trans-unit.source: Emperor Crocodile
trans-unit.target: 帝王鳄鱼

trans-unit.resname: UDS·105 | Emperor Crocodile | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When you control no other creatures, sacrifice CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 当你未操控其他生物时，牺牲CARDNAME。

trans-unit.source: The king of Yavimaya's waters pays constant attention to his subjects . . . and thrives on their adulation.
trans-unit.target: 亚维马雅水域之王者持续地照护他的臣民…并且因著他们的奉承而繁盛不息。

trans-unit.source: Gamekeeper
trans-unit.target: 猎场看守人

trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME is put into a graveyard from play, you may remove CARDNAME from the game. If you do, reveal cards from your library until you reveal a creature card. Put that card into play and put the other cards revealed this way into your graveyard.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME从场上置入任何坟墓场时，你可以将CARDNAME移出游戏。若你如此做，则展示你的牌库，直到展示出一张生物牌为止。将该牌放置进场，并将其他以此法展示的牌置入你的坟墓场。

trans-unit.source: Goliath Beetle
trans-unit.target: 巨大甲虫

trans-unit.source: Trample
trans-unit.target: 践踏

trans-unit.source: The balance of nature dictates that one day humans will be stepped on by bugs.
trans-unit.target: 依据自然均衡的道理，人类有一天也会被虫子给踩扁。

trans-unit.target: ocT：加一点绿色魔法力到你的魔法力池中。\no2，牺牲CARDNAME：抽一张牌。

trans-unit.source: "In Llanowar, we tend the forest's boughs and branches. In Yavimaya, we are a part of them."\n—Rofellos of Llanowar
trans-unit.target: 「在罗堰，我们维护树林的每株枝叶。在亚维马雅，我们则是它的一部分。」\n～罗堰的洛菲罗斯

trans-unit.source: Hunting Moa

trans-unit.source: Echo
trans-unit.target: 返响

trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME comes into play or is put into a graveyard from play, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME进场或是从场上置入任何坟墓场时，在目标生物上放置一个+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.source: All creatures get +1/+1 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 所有生物得+1/+1直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: The seed torches' pollen gives off light, but the elves find it heightens their senses as well.
trans-unit.target: 晴苗火炬的花粉放出光芒，而妖精们发现它也敏锐了他们的五感。

trans-unit.source: Marker Beetles
trans-unit.target: 标记甲虫

trans-unit.resname: UDS·112 | Marker Beetles | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME is put into a graveyard from play, target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME从场上置入任何坟墓场时，目标生物得+1/+1直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: UDS·112 | Marker Beetles | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: o2, Sacrifice CARDNAME: Draw a card.
trans-unit.target: o2，牺牲CARDNAME：抽一张牌。

trans-unit.source: In case of emergency, crush bug.
trans-unit.target: 若有紧急情况，请打破甲虫。

trans-unit.source: Momentum
trans-unit.target: 持续力

trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put a growth counter on CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 在你的维持开始时，你可以在CARDNAME上放置一个生长指示物。

trans-unit.source: Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 for each growth counter on CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME上每有一个生长指示物，受此结界的生物便得+1/+1。

trans-unit.source: Multani's Decree
trans-unit.target: 穆塔尼的裁决

trans-unit.resname: UDS·114 | Multani's Decree | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Destroy all enchantments. You gain 2 life for each enchantment destroyed this way.
trans-unit.target: 消灭所有结界。每以此法消灭一个结界，你便获得2点生命。

trans-unit.source: "This is my place of power. Nothing can take root here unless I allow it."\n—Multani, maro-sorcerer
trans-unit.target: 「此处由我统领。想在此生根得经过我的同意。」\n～马洛术士穆塔尼

trans-unit.resname: UDS·115 | Pattern of Rebirth | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Pattern of Rebirth
trans-unit.target: 转生的典范

trans-unit.resname: UDS·115 | Pattern of Rebirth | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When enchanted creature is put into a graveyard from play, that creature's controller may search his or her library for a creature card and put that card into play. If that player does, he or she then shuffles his or her library.
trans-unit.target: 当受此结界的生物从场上置入任何坟墓场时，该生物的操控者可以自他的牌库中搜寻一张生物牌，并将其放置进场。若该玩家如此做，则该玩家在其后将他的牌库洗牌。

trans-unit.source: Plated Spider
trans-unit.target: 覆甲蜘蛛

trans-unit.resname: UDS·116 | Plated Spider | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME may block as though it had flying.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME可以视同具有飞行异能地进行阻挡。

trans-unit.source: Most spiders wait patiently for their prey to arrive. Most spiders aren't forty feet tall.
trans-unit.target: 大多数的蜘蛛耐心地等待猎物上门。大多数的蜘蛛没有四十呎高。

trans-unit.source: Plow Under
trans-unit.target: 犁埋

trans-unit.resname: UDS·117 | Plow Under | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Put two target lands on top of their owner's library.
trans-unit.target: 将两张目标地置于其拥有者的牌库顶。

trans-unit.source: To renew the land, plow the land. To destroy the land, do nothing.\n—Druids' saying
trans-unit.target: 欲恢复地力，耕之。欲荒废地力，弃之。\n～德鲁依特谚语

trans-unit.resname: UDS·118 | Rofellos, Llanowar Emissary | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Rofellos, Llanowar Emissary
trans-unit.target: 罗堰密使洛菲罗斯

trans-unit.resname: UDS·118 | Rofellos, Llanowar Emissary | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: oc\nT: Add one green mana to your mana pool for each forest you control.
trans-unit.target: ocT：你每操控一个树林，便加一点绿色魔法力到你的魔法力池中。

trans-unit.source: Rofellos's Gift
trans-unit.target: 洛菲罗斯的献礼

trans-unit.resname: UDS·119 | Rofellos's Gift | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Reveal any number of green cards in your hand. Return an enchantment card from your graveyard to your hand for each card revealed this way.
trans-unit.target: 展示你手牌中任意数量的绿色牌。每以此法展示一张牌，你便将一张结界牌从你的坟墓场中移回你的手上。

trans-unit.source: "Rise, elf. We are both of Gaea, and thus we are equal."\n—Multani, to Rofellos
trans-unit.target: 「平身，妖精。我们都是盖亚的子民，因此我们的地位平等。」\n～穆塔尼致洛菲罗斯

trans-unit.resname: UDS·120 | Scent of Ivy | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Scent of Ivy
trans-unit.target: 长春藤气息

trans-unit.resname: UDS·120 | Scent of Ivy | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Reveal any number of green cards in your hand. Target creature gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of cards revealed this way.
trans-unit.target: 展示你手牌中任意数量的绿色牌。目标生物得+X/+X直到回合结束，X等同于你以此法展示的牌数量。

trans-unit.source: Splinter
trans-unit.target: 碎裂

trans-unit.source: Remove target artifact from the game. Search its controller's graveyard, hand, and library for all copies of that card and remove them from the game. That player then shuffles his or her library.
trans-unit.target: 将目标神器移出游戏。自该玩家的坟墓场、手牌、以及牌库中搜寻该名称的牌，并将这些牌移出游戏。在此后，该玩家将他的牌库洗牌。

trans-unit.source: Taunting Elf
trans-unit.target: 妖精辱骂员

trans-unit.resname: UDS·122 | Taunting Elf | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: All creatures able to block CARDNAME do so.
trans-unit.target: 所有能够阻挡CARDNAME的生物皆需阻挡牠。

trans-unit.source: Much to Multani's chagrin, Rofellos gleefully tutored Yavimaya's elves on the rudest and most vulgar words spoken in Llanowar.
trans-unit.target: 洛菲罗斯饶富趣味地将罗堰所用最粗野不文的字眼，尽数教给亚维马雅的妖精们。这令穆塔尼苦恼万分。

trans-unit.source: Thorn Elemental
trans-unit.target: 刺棘元素

trans-unit.resname: UDS·123 | Thorn Elemental | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME may deal its combat damage to defending player as though it weren't blocked.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME可以视同未受阻挡地对防御玩家造成战斗伤害。

trans-unit.source: Rain from this storm leaves you pinned to the ground like an insect.
trans-unit.target: 这阵风暴带来的雨滴，可以把你像昆虫般地钉在地上。

trans-unit.source: Yavimaya Elder
trans-unit.target: 亚维马雅长者

trans-unit.resname: UDS·124 | Yavimaya Elder | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME is put into a graveyard from play, you may search your library for up to two basic land cards, reveal them, and put them into your hand. If you do, shuffle your library.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME从场上置入任何坟墓场时，你可以自你的牌库中搜寻至多两张基本地牌，将其展示后放入手牌中。若你如此做，则将你的牌库洗牌。

trans-unit.resname: UDS·124 | Yavimaya Elder | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: o2, Sacrifice CARDNAME: Draw a card.
trans-unit.target: o2，牺牲CARDNAME：抽一张牌。

trans-unit.source: Yavimaya Enchantress
trans-unit.target: 亚维马雅咒术师

trans-unit.resname: UDS·125 | Yavimaya Enchantress | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME gets +1/+1 for each enchantment in play.
trans-unit.target: 场上每有一个结界，CARDNAME便得+1/+1。

trans-unit.source: From each seed, a world. From each world, a thousand seeds.
trans-unit.target: 一颗种子创造世界，一个世界培育出上千颗种子。

trans-unit.source: Braidwood Cup
trans-unit.target: 编枝杯

trans-unit.resname: UDS·126 | Braidwood Cup | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: oc\nT: You gain 1 life.
trans-unit.target: ocT：你获得1点生命。

trans-unit.source: "I think it no accident that every civilized people has discovered the art of distillation."\n—Rofellos of Llanowar
trans-unit.target: 「每个已开化的种族都知晓蒸馏的技术，我不认为这是个巧合。」\n～罗堰的洛菲罗斯

trans-unit.source: Braidwood Sextant
trans-unit.target: 编枝六分仪

trans-unit.resname: UDS·127 | Braidwood Sextant | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: o2, oc\nT, Sacrifice CARDNAME: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal that card, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.
trans-unit.target: o2，ocT，牺牲CARDNAME：自你的牌库中搜寻一张基本地牌，将其展示后，放入你的手牌。然后将你的牌库洗牌。

trans-unit.source: Brass Secretary
trans-unit.target: 黄铜书记

trans-unit.resname: UDS·128 | Brass Secretary | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: o2, Sacrifice CARDNAME: Draw a card.
trans-unit.target: o2，牺牲CARDNAME：抽一张牌。

trans-unit.source: The students disliked the secretary for its unfailing memory—until they discovered it couldn't dodge thrown objects.
trans-unit.target: 由于它的从不忘事，书记一直都不受学生们欢迎～直到他们发现它躲不开丢过去的东西。

trans-unit.source: Caltrops
trans-unit.target: 铁蒺藜

trans-unit.source: Whenever a creature attacks, CARDNAME deals 1 damage to it.
trans-unit.target: 每当任何生物攻击时，CARDNAME对该生物造成1点伤害。

trans-unit.source: Toward the end, Gatha struggled to keep his experiments in and his patrons out.
trans-unit.target: 到了后期，迦沙努力隐瞒他的实验，并且极力不让资助者进来。

trans-unit.source: Extruder
trans-unit.target: 冲锋机械

trans-unit.source: Echo
trans-unit.target: 返响

trans-unit.source: Sacrifice an artifact: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.
trans-unit.target: 牺牲一个神器：在目标生物上放置一个+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.source: As the invasion drew closer, Urza's means began to resemble Phyrexia's end.
trans-unit.target: 随著侵略的逐步接近，克撒的目标开始朝向如何终结非瑞克西亚。

trans-unit.source: Fodder Cannon
trans-unit.target: 粮秣大炮

trans-unit.resname: UDS·131 | Fodder Cannon | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: o4, oc\nT, Sacrifice a creature: CARDNAME deals 4 damage to target creature.
trans-unit.target: o4，ocT，牺牲一个生物：粮秣大砲对目标生物造成4点伤害。

trans-unit.source: Step 1: Find your cousin. Step 2: Get your cousin in the cannon. Step 3: Find another cousin.
trans-unit.target: 步骤一：找一个亲戚。\n步骤二：把你的亲戚放到大砲里。\n步骤三：找另一个亲戚。

trans-unit.source: Junk Diver
trans-unit.target: 垃圾掠集兽

trans-unit.resname: UDS·132 | Junk Diver | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Flying
trans-unit.target: 飞行

trans-unit.resname: UDS·132 | Junk Diver | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME is put into a graveyard from play, return another target artifact card from your graveyard to your hand.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME从场上置入任何坟墓场时，将另一个目标神器牌从你的坟墓场中移回你的手上。

trans-unit.source: Garbage in, treasure out.
trans-unit.target: 废物换宝物。

trans-unit.source: Mantis Engine
trans-unit.target: 螳螂引擎

trans-unit.resname: UDS·133 | Mantis Engine | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: o2: CARDNAME gains flying until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: o2：CARDNAME获得飞行异能直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: UDS·133 | Mantis Engine | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: o2: CARDNAME gains first strike until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: o2：CARDNAME获得先攻异能直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: Tawnos left a legacy of animal designs in many of Urza's creations.
trans-unit.target: 受到达硌士留下的影响，克撒有许多作品是模仿动物而设计。

trans-unit.source: Masticore
trans-unit.target: 异狮

trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may choose and discard a card from your hand. If you don't, sacrifice CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 在你的维持开始时，你可以从手牌中选择并弃掉一张牌。若你不如此做，则牺牲CARDNAME。

trans-unit.source: o2: CARDNAME deals 1 damage to target creature.
trans-unit.target: o2：CARDNAME对目标生物造成1点伤害。

trans-unit.source: o2: Regenerate CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: o2：重生CARDNAME。

trans-unit.source: Metalworker
trans-unit.target: 金属工人

trans-unit.source: oc\nT: Reveal any number of artifact cards in your hand. Add two colorless mana to your mana pool for each card revealed this way.
trans-unit.target: ocT：展示你手牌中任意数量的神器牌。你每以此法展示一张牌，便加两点无色魔法力到你的魔法力池中。

trans-unit.source: "At this rate I fully expect to be replaced by a clockwork golem by year's end."\n—Barrin
trans-unit.target: 「照这个速度进行下去，看来在年尾之前我就会给个发条魔像取代掉。」\n～巴林

trans-unit.source: Powder Keg
trans-unit.target: 炸药桶

trans-unit.resname: UDS·136 | Powder Keg | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put a fuse counter on CARDNAME.\noc\nT, Sacrifice CARDNAME: Destroy each artifact and creature with converted mana cost equal to the number of fuse counters on CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 在你的维持开始时，你可以在CARDNAME上放置一个导线指示物。\nocT，牺牲CARDNAME：消灭每个总魔法力费用等同于CARDNAME上导线指示物数量的神器和生物。

trans-unit.source: Scrying Glass
trans-unit.target: 占卜玻璃

trans-unit.resname: UDS·137 | Scrying Glass | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: o3, oc\nT: Choose a number greater than 0 and a color. Target opponent reveals his or her hand. If that opponent reveals exactly the chosen number of cards of the chosen color, you draw a card.
trans-unit.target: o3，ocT：选择一个大于0的数字以及一个颜色。目标对手展示其手牌。若该对手所展示之该色牌的数量正好是你所选择的数字，你抽一张牌。

trans-unit.source: Storage Matrix
trans-unit.target: 储藏密室

trans-unit.resname: UDS·138 | Storage Matrix | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: As long as CARDNAME is untapped, instead of each player untapping the permanents he or she controls during his or her untap step, that player chooses artifacts, creatures, or lands and untaps all permanents of the chosen type he or she controls.
trans-unit.target: 若CARDNAME为未横置，则每位玩家在其重置步骤中不重置所有他操控的永久物，而改为选择神器，生物或地，并且重置所有他操控之该类别的永久物。

trans-unit.source: Thran Dynamo
trans-unit.target: 索蓝发电机

trans-unit.resname: UDS·139 | Thran Dynamo | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: oc\nT: Add three colorless mana to your mana pool.
trans-unit.target: ocT：加三点无色魔法力到你的魔法力池中。

trans-unit.source: Urza's metathran children were conceived, birthed, and nurtured by an integrated system of machines.
trans-unit.target: 克撒的仿索蓝族裔是由一个以机械的整合系统所孕育、产出，并教养的。

trans-unit.source: Thran Foundry
trans-unit.target: 索蓝铸造厂

trans-unit.resname: UDS·140 | Thran Foundry | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: o1, oc\nT, Remove CARDNAME from the game: Target player shuffles his or her graveyard into his or her library.
trans-unit.target: o1，ocT，将CARDNAME移出游戏：目标玩家将其坟墓场洗入他的牌库中。

trans-unit.source: "What we do not use up, we use again."\n—Urza
trans-unit.target: 「我们没能用完的，就再用一次。」\n～克撒

trans-unit.source: Thran Golem
trans-unit.target: 索蓝魔像

trans-unit.resname: UDS·141 | Thran Golem | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: As long as CARDNAME is enchanted, it gets +2/+2 and gains flying, first strike, and trample.
trans-unit.target: 若CARDNAME受有任何结界，它便得+2/+2并获得飞行、先攻和践踏异能。

trans-unit.source: Karn felt more secure about his value to Urza when he realized he didn't need regular trimming.
trans-unit.target: 当他明了自己不需要经常整备时，卡恩对自己在克撒眼中的价值，感到更有安全感。

trans-unit.source: Urza's Incubator
trans-unit.target: 克撒的抚育设备

trans-unit.resname: UDS·142 | Urza's Incubator | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME comes into play, choose a creature type.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进场时，选择一个生物类别。

trans-unit.resname: UDS·142 | Urza's Incubator | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Creature spells of the chosen type cost o2 less to play.
trans-unit.target: 该生物类别的生物咒语减少o2即可使用。

trans-unit.source: "Stop thinking like an artificer, Urza, and start thinking like a father!"\n—Rayne, Academy Chancellor
trans-unit.target: 「别再像个神器师般地思考了，克撒；该开始像个父亲般地来看事情！」\n～大学院长蕾安

trans-unit.source: Yavimaya Hollow
trans-unit.target: 亚维马雅空心林

trans-unit.resname: UDS·143 | Yavimaya Hollow | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source:
oc
T: Add one colorless mana to your mana pool.
o
G, oc
T: Regenerate target creature.
trans-unit.target: ocT：加一点无色魔法力到你的魔法力池中。\noG，ocT：重生目标生物。

trans-unit.source: For all its traps and defenses, Yavimaya has its havens, too.
trans-unit.target: 亚维马雅中布满陷阱与防线，但也找得到避难所。
